instruction: Create a ‘nice-to-have’ list for a product inventory system.
output:
• Barcode scanner for efficient inventory tracking.
• Ability to alert stakeholders about low inventory levels. 
• Automated invoicing. 
• Data export feature to generate reports in various formats. 
• Automated purchasing system to re-order stock. 
• Flexible search capability to locate items quickly. 
• Integration with point-of-sale systems. 
• Mobile app to enable remote access. 
• Automated alerts for stock delivery. 
• Automated alerts for out of stock items.
• Shipping and tracking support. 
• Real-time inventory updates. 
• Stock adjustments to account for returns and damages. 
‐ Customizable views and reports. 
• Tracking of customer order history.
• Customer support portal to review orders. 
• Automatically create product barcodes. 
• Automatically generate purchase orders. 
• Automatically create promotional offers. 
• Automated replenishment of inventory. 
• Automated pricing rules. 
• Automated stock monitoring. 
• Business intelligence analytics.
